1.4.1.name: wordpress/jrwdev-daily-specials
1.4.1.description: This plugin adds a custom post type Daily Specials to your site allowing you to easily feature daily specials from your store in either a widget or on a page or post via shortcode. It requires the advanced custom fields plugin (by Elliot Condon v3.0 or later) to operate correctly.
